name: Absorb (OvioStudios)
description:
Absorb is a fast paced action game, where you absorb enemies to use their power against them, pushing your way through a world that is completely against you.

Break out of your seemingly eternal imprisonment and discover a beautiful lost world, full of dangerous inhabitants and mysterious structures.

Absorb was made with an awesome team of people from AIE! We made this game for our Major Production assessment.
